description: Types used by the Language server for node
author: Microsoft Corporation
name: vscode-languageserver-types

scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.all:publish: git clean -xfd . && npm install && npm run compile:esm && npm run compile:umd && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo "⛔ Can only publish from a secure pipeline ⛔" && node ../build/npm/fail
